fg-set.label: Have you purchased a motor vehicle after 12/31/2024?

Is the vehicle intended for personal use and not commercial or fleet use?

Is the vehicle meant for driving on public streets, roads and highways?

Is the vehicle a car, minivan, van, sport utility vehicle, pickup truck, or motorcycle?
Is the Gross Vehicle Weight Rating below 14,000 lbs?
Was the final assembly of the vehicle in the United States?
How much interest have you paid on the loan during the current taxable year to-date?
